module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary

-- | The summary of skills.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSkillSummary</a> smart constructor.
data SkillSummary
SkillSummary' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe SkillType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe EnablementType -> SkillSummary

-- | The ARN of the skill summary.
[$sel:skillId:SkillSummary'] :: SkillSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | Linking support for a skill.
[$sel:supportsLinking:SkillSummary'] :: SkillSummary -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the skill is publicly available or is a private skill.
[$sel:skillType:SkillSummary'] :: SkillSummary -> Maybe SkillType

-- | The name of the skill.
[$sel:skillName:SkillSummary'] :: SkillSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the skill is enabled under the user's account, or if it
--   requires linking to be used.
[$sel:enablementType:SkillSummary'] :: SkillSummary -> Maybe EnablementType

-- | Create a value of <a>SkillSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillId:SkillSummary'</a>, <a>skillSummary_skillId</a> - The
--   ARN of the skill summary.
--   
--   <a>$sel:supportsLinking:SkillSummary'</a>,
--   <a>skillSummary_supportsLinking</a> - Linking support for a skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillType:SkillSummary'</a>, <a>skillSummary_skillType</a> -
--   Whether the skill is publicly available or is a private skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillName:SkillSummary'</a>, <a>skillSummary_skillName</a> -
--   The name of the skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enablementType:SkillSummary'</a>,
--   <a>skillSummary_enablementType</a> - Whether the skill is enabled
--   under the user's account, or if it requires linking to be used.
newSkillSummary :: SkillSummary

-- | The ARN of the skill summary.
skillSummary_skillId :: Lens' SkillSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | Linking support for a skill.
skillSummary_supportsLinking :: Lens' SkillSummary (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the skill is publicly available or is a private skill.
skillSummary_skillType :: Lens' SkillSummary (Maybe SkillType)

-- | The name of the skill.
skillSummary_skillName :: Lens' SkillSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the skill is enabled under the user's account, or if it
--   requires linking to be used.
skillSummary_enablementType :: Lens' SkillSummary (Maybe EnablementType)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillSummary.SkillSummary

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.SkillsStoreSkill

-- | The detailed information about an Alexa skill.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSkillsStoreSkill</a> smart constructor.
data SkillsStoreSkill
SkillsStoreSkill' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SkillDetails -> SkillsStoreSkill

-- | The URL where the skill icon resides.
[$sel:iconUrl:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the skill.
[$sel:skillId:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe Text

-- | Short description about the skill.
[$sel:shortDescription:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe Text

-- | Linking support for a skill.
[$sel:supportsLinking:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe Bool

-- | Sample utterances that interact with the skill.
[$sel:sampleUtterances:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The name of the skill.
[$sel:skillName:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe Text

-- | Information about the skill.
[$sel:skillDetails:SkillsStoreSkill'] :: SkillsStoreSkill -> Maybe SkillDetails

-- | Create a value of <a>SkillsStoreSkill</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:iconUrl:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>, <a>skillsStoreSkill_iconUrl</a>
--   - The URL where the skill icon resides.
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillId:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>, <a>skillsStoreSkill_skillId</a>
--   - The ARN of the skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:shortDescription:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>,
--   <a>skillsStoreSkill_shortDescription</a> - Short description about the
--   skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:supportsLinking:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>,
--   <a>skillsStoreSkill_supportsLinking</a> - Linking support for a skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sampleUtterances:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>,
--   <a>skillsStoreSkill_sampleUtterances</a> - Sample utterances that
--   interact with the skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillName:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>,
--   <a>skillsStoreSkill_skillName</a> - The name of the skill.
--   
--   <a>$sel:skillDetails:SkillsStoreSkill'</a>,
--   <a>skillsStoreSkill_skillDetails</a> - Information about the skill.
newSkillsStoreSkill :: SkillsStoreSkill

-- | The URL where the skill icon resides.
skillsStoreSkill_iconUrl :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the skill.
skillsStoreSkill_skillId :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe Text)

-- | Short description about the skill.
skillsStoreSkill_shortDescription :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe Text)

-- | Linking support for a skill.
skillsStoreSkill_supportsLinking :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe Bool)

-- | Sample utterances that interact with the skill.
skillsStoreSkill_sampleUtterances :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe [Text])

-- | The name of the skill.
skillsStoreSkill_skillName :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe Text)

-- | Information about the skill.
skillsStoreSkill_skillDetails :: Lens' SkillsStoreSkill (Maybe SkillDetails)

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Sort

-- | An object representing a sort criteria.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSort</a> smart constructor.
data Sort
Sort' :: Text -> SortValue -> Sort

-- | The sort key of a sort object.
[$sel:key:Sort'] :: Sort -> Text

-- | The sort value of a sort object.
[$sel:value:Sort'] :: Sort -> SortValue

-- | Create a value of <a>Sort</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Sort'</a>, <a>sort_key</a> - The sort key of a sort
--   object.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Sort'</a>, <a>sort_value</a> - The sort value of a sort
--   object.
newSort :: Text -> SortValue -> Sort

-- | The sort key of a sort object.
sort_key :: Lens' Sort Text

-- | The sort value of a sort object.
sort_value :: Lens' Sort SortValue
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Sort.Sort
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Sort.Sort
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Sort.Sort

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml

-- | The SSML message. For more information, see <a>SSML Reference</a>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSsml</a> smart constructor.
data Ssml
Ssml' :: Locale -> Text -> Ssml

-- | The locale of the SSML message. Currently, en-US is supported.
[$sel:locale:Ssml'] :: Ssml -> Locale

-- | The value of the SSML message in the correct SSML format. The audio
--   tag is not supported.
[$sel:value:Ssml'] :: Ssml -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Ssml</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:locale:Ssml'</a>, <a>ssml_locale</a> - The locale of the SSML
--   message. Currently, en-US is supported.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Ssml'</a>, <a>ssml_value</a> - The value of the SSML
--   message in the correct SSML format. The audio tag is not supported.
newSsml :: Locale -> Text -> Ssml

-- | The locale of the SSML message. Currently, en-US is supported.
ssml_locale :: Lens' Ssml Locale

-- | The value of the SSML message in the correct SSML format. The audio
--   tag is not supported.
ssml_value :: Lens' Ssml Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Ssml.Ssml


module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag

-- | A key-value pair that can be associated with a resource.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTag</a> smart constructor.
data Tag
Tag' :: Text -> Text -> Tag

-- | The key of a tag. Tag keys are case-sensitive.
[$sel:key:Tag'] :: Tag -> Text

-- | The value of a tag. Tag values are case sensitive and can be null.
[$sel:value:Tag'] :: Tag -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Tag</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_key</a> - The key of a tag. Tag keys are
--   case-sensitive.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_value</a> - The value of a tag. Tag
--   values are case sensitive and can be null.
newTag :: Text -> Text -> Tag

-- | The key of a tag. Tag keys are case-sensitive.
tag_key :: Lens' Tag Text

-- | The value of a tag. Tag values are case sensitive and can be null.
tag_value :: Lens' Tag Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Tag.Tag

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.TextMessage

-- | The text message.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTextMessage</a> smart constructor.
data TextMessage
TextMessage' :: Locale -> Text -> TextMessage

-- | The locale of the text message. Currently, en-US is supported.
[$sel:locale:TextMessage'] :: TextMessage -> Locale

-- | The value of the text message.
[$sel:value:TextMessage'] :: TextMessage -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>TextMessage</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   locale of the text message. Currently, en-US is supported.
--

--   of the text message.
newTextMessage :: Locale -> Text -> TextMessage

-- | The locale of the text message. Currently, en-US is supported.
textMessage_locale :: Lens' TextMessage Locale

-- | The value of the text message.
textMessage_value :: Lens' TextMessage Text

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content

-- | The content definition. This can contain only one text, SSML, or audio
--   list object.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContent</a> smart constructor.
data Content
Content' :: Maybe [TextMessage] -> Maybe [Ssml] -> Maybe [Audio] -> Content

-- | The list of text messages.
[$sel:textList:Content'] :: Content -> Maybe [TextMessage]

-- | The list of SSML messages.
[$sel:ssmlList:Content'] :: Content -> Maybe [Ssml]

-- | The list of audio messages.
[$sel:audioList:Content'] :: Content -> Maybe [Audio]

-- | Create a value of <a>Content</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:textList:Content'</a>, <a>content_textList</a> - The list of
--   text messages.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ssmlList:Content'</a>, <a>content_ssmlList</a> - The list of
--   SSML messages.
--   
--   <a>$sel:audioList:Content'</a>, <a>content_audioList</a> - The list of
--   audio messages.
newContent :: Content

-- | The list of text messages.
content_textList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [TextMessage])

-- | The list of SSML messages.
content_ssmlList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [Ssml])

-- | The list of audio messages.
content_audioList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [Audio])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Content.Content


module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | Settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateEndOfMeetingReminder</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder
UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder' :: Maybe (NonEmpty Int) -> Maybe EndOfMeetingReminderType -> Maybe Bool -> UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | Updates settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are
--   applied to a room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa
--   to remind users when a meeting is ending.
[$sel:reminderAtMinutes:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder -> Maybe (NonEmpty Int)

-- | The type of sound that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
[$sel:reminderType:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder -> Maybe EndOfMeetingReminderType

-- | Whether an end of meeting reminder is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reminderAtMinutes:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>updateEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderAtMinutes</a> - Updates settings
--   for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a room
--   profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind users
--   when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reminderType:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>updateEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderType</a> - The type of sound
--   that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>updateEndOfMeetingReminder_enabled</a> - Whether an end of meeting
--   reminder is enabled or not.
newUpdateEndOfMeetingReminder :: UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | Updates settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are
--   applied to a room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa
--   to remind users when a meeting is ending.
updateEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderAtMinutes :: Lens' UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder (Maybe (NonEmpty Int))

-- | The type of sound that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
updateEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderType :: Lens' UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder (Maybe EndOfMeetingReminderType)

-- | Whether an end of meeting reminder is enabled or not.
updateEndOfMeetingReminder_enabled :: Lens' UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder (Maybe Bool)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder.UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking

-- | Updates settings for the instant booking feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. If instant booking is enabled, Alexa automatically
--   reserves a room if it is free when a user joins a meeting with Alexa.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateInstantBooking</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateInstantBooking
UpdateInstantBooking' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Bool -> UpdateInstantBooking

-- | Duration between 15 and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that
--   determines how long to book an available room when a meeting is
--   started with Alexa.
[$sel:durationInMinutes:UpdateInstantBooking'] :: UpdateInstantBooking -> Maybe Int

-- | Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:UpdateInstantBooking'] :: UpdateInstantBooking -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateInstantBooking</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInMinutes:UpdateInstantBooking'</a>,
--   <a>updateInstantBooking_durationInMinutes</a> - Duration between 15
--   and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that determines how long to book
--   an available room when a meeting is started with Alexa.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:UpdateInstantBooking'</a>,
--   <a>updateInstantBooking_enabled</a> - Whether instant booking is
--   enabled or not.
newUpdateInstantBooking :: UpdateInstantBooking

-- | Duration between 15 and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that
--   determines how long to book an available room when a meeting is
--   started with Alexa.
updateInstantBooking_durationInMinutes :: Lens' UpdateInstantBooking (Maybe Int)

-- | Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
updateInstantBooking_enabled :: Lens' UpdateInstantBooking (Maybe Bool)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateInstantBooking.UpdateInstantBooking


module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn

-- | Updates settings for the require check in feature that are applied to
--   a room profile. Require check in allows a meeting roomâ€™s Alexa or AVS
--   device to prompt the user to check in; otherwise, the room will be
--   released.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateRequireCheckIn</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateRequireCheckIn
UpdateRequireCheckIn' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Bool -> UpdateRequireCheckIn

-- | Duration between 5 and 20 minutes to determine when to release the
--   room if it's not checked into.
[$sel:releaseAfterMinutes:UpdateRequireCheckIn'] :: UpdateRequireCheckIn -> Maybe Int

-- | Whether require check in is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:UpdateRequireCheckIn'] :: UpdateRequireCheckIn -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateRequireCheckIn</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:releaseAfterMinutes:UpdateRequireCheckIn'</a>,
--   <a>updateRequireCheckIn_releaseAfterMinutes</a> - Duration between 5
--   and 20 minutes to determine when to release the room if it's not
--   checked into.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:UpdateRequireCheckIn'</a>,
--   <a>updateRequireCheckIn_enabled</a> - Whether require check in is
--   enabled or not.
newUpdateRequireCheckIn :: UpdateRequireCheckIn

-- | Duration between 5 and 20 minutes to determine when to release the
--   room if it's not checked into.
updateRequireCheckIn_releaseAfterMinutes :: Lens' UpdateRequireCheckIn (Maybe Int)

-- | Whether require check in is enabled or not.
updateRequireCheckIn_enabled :: Lens' UpdateRequireCheckIn (Maybe Bool)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn.UpdateRequireCheckIn
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn.UpdateRequireCheckIn
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn.UpdateRequireCheckIn
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn.UpdateRequireCheckIn
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateRequireCheckIn.UpdateRequireCheckIn

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | Updates meeting room settings of a room profile.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration
UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder -> Maybe UpdateInstantBooking -> Maybe UpdateRequireCheckIn -> UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
[$sel:roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe Bool

-- | Settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
[$sel:endOfMeetingReminder:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | Settings to automatically book an available room available for a
--   configured duration when joining a meeting with Alexa.
[$sel:instantBooking:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe UpdateInstantBooking

-- | Settings for requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can
--   cancel a room reservation if it's not checked into to make the room
--   available for others. Users can check in by joining the meeting with
--   Alexa or an AVS device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
[$sel:requireCheckIn:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe UpdateRequireCheckIn

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled</a> -
--   Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endOfMeetingReminder:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_endOfMeetingReminder</a> - Settings
--   for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a room
--   profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind users
--   when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <a>$sel:instantBooking:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_instantBooking</a> - Settings to
--   automatically book an available room available for a configured
--   duration when joining a meeting with Alexa.
--   
--   <a>$sel:requireCheckIn:UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_requireCheckIn</a> - Settings for
--   requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can cancel a room
--   reservation if it's not checked into to make the room available for
--   others. Users can check in by joining the meeting with Alexa or an AVS
--   device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
newUpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration :: UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled :: Lens' UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe Bool)

-- | Settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_endOfMeetingReminder :: Lens' UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe UpdateEndOfMeetingReminder)

-- | Settings to automatically book an available room available for a
--   configured duration when joining a meeting with Alexa.
updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_instantBooking :: Lens' UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe UpdateInstantBooking)

-- | Settings for requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can
--   cancel a room reservation if it's not checked into to make the room
--   available for others. Users can check in by joining the meeting with
--   Alexa or an AVS device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
updateMeetingRoomConfiguration_requireCheckIn :: Lens' UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe UpdateRequireCheckIn)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration.UpdateMeetingRoomConfiguration

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UserData

-- | Information related to a user.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUserData</a> smart constructor.
data UserData
UserData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe EnrollmentStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> UserData

-- | The ARN of a user.
[$sel:userArn:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe Text

-- | The enrollment ARN of a user.
[$sel:enrollmentId:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe Text

-- | The email of a user.
[$sel:email:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe Text

-- | The enrollment status of a user.
[$sel:enrollmentStatus:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe EnrollmentStatus

-- | The last name of a user.
[$sel:lastName:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe Text

-- | The first name of a user.
[$sel:firstName:UserData'] :: UserData -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UserData</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:userArn:UserData'</a>, <a>userData_userArn</a> - The ARN of a
--   user.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enrollmentId:UserData'</a>, <a>userData_enrollmentId</a> - The
--   enrollment ARN of a user.
--   
--   <a>$sel:email:UserData'</a>, <a>userData_email</a> - The email of a
--   user.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enrollmentStatus:UserData'</a>,
--   <a>userData_enrollmentStatus</a> - The enrollment status of a user.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastName:UserData'</a>, <a>userData_lastName</a> - The last
--   name of a user.
--   
--   <a>$sel:firstName:UserData'</a>, <a>userData_firstName</a> - The first
--   name of a user.
newUserData :: UserData

-- | The ARN of a user.
userData_userArn :: Lens' UserData (Maybe Text)

-- | The enrollment ARN of a user.
userData_enrollmentId :: Lens' UserData (Maybe Text)

-- | The email of a user.
userData_email :: Lens' UserData (Maybe Text)

-- | The enrollment status of a user.
userData_enrollmentStatus :: Lens' UserData (Maybe EnrollmentStatus)

-- | The last name of a user.
userData_lastName :: Lens' UserData (Maybe Text)

-- | The first name of a user.
userData_firstName :: Lens' UserData (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UserData.UserData
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UserData.UserData
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.UserData.UserData

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData

-- | The data of a room profile.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newProfileData</a> smart constructor.
data ProfileData
ProfileData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe TemperatureUnit -> Maybe WakeWord -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe DistanceUnit -> ProfileData

-- | The name of a room profile.
[$sel:profileName:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Text

-- | Retrieves if the profile data is default or not.
[$sel:isDefault:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Bool

-- | The address of a room profile.
[$sel:address:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Text

-- | The locale of a room profile. (This is currently available only to a
--   limited preview audience.)
[$sel:locale:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Text

-- | The temperature unit of a room profile.
[$sel:temperatureUnit:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe TemperatureUnit

-- | The wake word of a room profile.
[$sel:wakeWord:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe WakeWord

-- | The ARN of a room profile.
[$sel:profileArn:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Text

-- | The time zone of a room profile.
[$sel:timezone:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe Text

-- | The distance unit of a room profile.
[$sel:distanceUnit:ProfileData'] :: ProfileData -> Maybe DistanceUnit

-- | Create a value of <a>ProfileData</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:profileName:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_profileName</a> -
--   The name of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isDefault:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_isDefault</a> -
--   Retrieves if the profile data is default or not.
--   
--   <a>$sel:address:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_address</a> - The
--   address of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:locale:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_locale</a> - The
--   locale of a room profile. (This is currently available only to a
--   limited preview audience.)
--   
--   <a>$sel:temperatureUnit:ProfileData'</a>,
--   <a>profileData_temperatureUnit</a> - The temperature unit of a room
--   profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:wakeWord:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_wakeWord</a> - The
--   wake word of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:profileArn:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_profileArn</a> -
--   The ARN of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timezone:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_timezone</a> - The
--   time zone of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:distanceUnit:ProfileData'</a>, <a>profileData_distanceUnit</a>
--   - The distance unit of a room profile.
newProfileData :: ProfileData

-- | The name of a room profile.
profileData_profileName :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Text)

-- | Retrieves if the profile data is default or not.
profileData_isDefault :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Bool)

-- | The address of a room profile.
profileData_address :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Text)

-- | The locale of a room profile. (This is currently available only to a
--   limited preview audience.)
profileData_locale :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Text)

-- | The temperature unit of a room profile.
profileData_temperatureUnit :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe TemperatureUnit)

-- | The wake word of a room profile.
profileData_wakeWord :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe WakeWord)

-- | The ARN of a room profile.
profileData_profileArn :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Text)

-- | The time zone of a room profile.
profileData_timezone :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe Text)

-- | The distance unit of a room profile.
profileData_distanceUnit :: Lens' ProfileData (Maybe DistanceUnit)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData.ProfileData
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData.ProfileData
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData.ProfileData
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData.ProfileData
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.ProfileData.ProfileData

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Profile

-- | A room profile with attributes.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newProfile</a> smart constructor.
data Profile
Profile' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe TemperatureUnit -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Int -> Maybe WakeWord -> Maybe Text -> Maybe MeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe DistanceUnit -> Profile

-- | The name of a room profile.
[$sel:profileName:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | Retrieves if the profile is default or not.
[$sel:isDefault:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Bool

-- | The address of a room profile.
[$sel:address:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | The locale of a room profile. (This is currently available only to a
--   limited preview audience.)
[$sel:locale:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | The temperature unit of a room profile.
[$sel:temperatureUnit:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe TemperatureUnit

-- | The ARN of the address book.
[$sel:addressBookArn:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | The PSTN setting of a room profile.
[$sel:pSTNEnabled:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Bool

-- | The setup mode of a room profile.
[$sel:setupModeDisabled:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Bool

-- | The max volume limit of a room profile.
[$sel:maxVolumeLimit:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Int

-- | The wake word of a room profile.
[$sel:wakeWord:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe WakeWord

-- | The ARN of a room profile.
[$sel:profileArn:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | Meeting room settings of a room profile.
[$sel:meetingRoomConfiguration:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe MeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | The time zone of a room profile.
[$sel:timezone:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether data retention of the profile is enabled.
[$sel:dataRetentionOptIn:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe Bool

-- | The distance unit of a room profile.
[$sel:distanceUnit:Profile'] :: Profile -> Maybe DistanceUnit

-- | Create a value of <a>Profile</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:profileName:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_profileName</a> - The
--   name of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isDefault:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_isDefault</a> - Retrieves
--   if the profile is default or not.
--   
--   <a>$sel:address:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_address</a> - The address of
--   a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:locale:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_locale</a> - The locale of a
--   room profile. (This is currently available only to a limited preview
--   audience.)
--   
--   <a>$sel:temperatureUnit:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_temperatureUnit</a> -
--   The temperature unit of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:addressBookArn:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_addressBookArn</a> -
--   The ARN of the address book.
--   
--   <a>$sel:pSTNEnabled:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_pSTNEnabled</a> - The
--   PSTN setting of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:setupModeDisabled:Profile'</a>,
--   <a>profile_setupModeDisabled</a> - The setup mode of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxVolumeLimit:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_maxVolumeLimit</a> -
--   The max volume limit of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:wakeWord:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_wakeWord</a> - The wake word
--   of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:profileArn:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_profileArn</a> - The ARN
--   of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:meetingRoomConfiguration:Profile'</a>,
--   <a>profile_meetingRoomConfiguration</a> - Meeting room settings of a
--   room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timezone:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_timezone</a> - The time zone
--   of a room profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataRetentionOptIn:Profile'</a>,
--   <a>profile_dataRetentionOptIn</a> - Whether data retention of the
--   profile is enabled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:distanceUnit:Profile'</a>, <a>profile_distanceUnit</a> - The
--   distance unit of a room profile.
newProfile :: Profile

-- | The name of a room profile.
profile_profileName :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | Retrieves if the profile is default or not.
profile_isDefault :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Bool)

-- | The address of a room profile.
profile_address :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | The locale of a room profile. (This is currently available only to a
--   limited preview audience.)
profile_locale :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | The temperature unit of a room profile.
profile_temperatureUnit :: Lens' Profile (Maybe TemperatureUnit)

-- | The ARN of the address book.
profile_addressBookArn :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | The PSTN setting of a room profile.
profile_pSTNEnabled :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Bool)

-- | The setup mode of a room profile.
profile_setupModeDisabled :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Bool)

-- | The max volume limit of a room profile.
profile_maxVolumeLimit :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Int)

-- | The wake word of a room profile.
profile_wakeWord :: Lens' Profile (Maybe WakeWord)

-- | The ARN of a room profile.
profile_profileArn :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | Meeting room settings of a room profile.
profile_meetingRoomConfiguration :: Lens' Profile (Maybe MeetingRoomConfiguration)

-- | The time zone of a room profile.
profile_timezone :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether data retention of the profile is enabled.
profile_dataRetentionOptIn :: Lens' Profile (Maybe Bool)

-- | The distance unit of a room profile.
profile_distanceUnit :: Lens' Profile (Maybe DistanceUnit)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Profile.Profile
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Profile.Profile
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Profile.Profile
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types.Profile.Profile

module Network.AWS.AlexaBusiness.Types

-- | API version <tt>2017-11-09</tt> of the Amazon Alexa For Business SDK
--   configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The resource is not found.
_NotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The service linked role is locked for deletion.
_InvalidServiceLinkedRoleStateException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The attempt to update a user is invalid due to the user's current
--   status.
_InvalidUserStatusException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The caller has no permissions to operate on the resource involved in
--   the API call.
_UnauthorizedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Another resource is associated with the resource in the request.
_ResourceAssociatedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The Certificate Authority can't issue or revoke a certificate.
_InvalidCertificateAuthorityException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | There is a concurrent modification of resources.
_ConcurrentModificationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request failed because this device is no longer registered and
--   therefore no longer managed by this account.
_DeviceNotRegisteredException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The name sent in the request is already in use.
_NameInUseException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The resource being created already exists.
_AlreadyExistsException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You are performing an action that would put you beyond your account's
--   limits.
_LimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The resource in the request is already in use.
_ResourceInUseException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The device is in an invalid state.
_InvalidDeviceException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The skill must be linked to a third-party account.
_SkillNotLinkedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | A password in SecretsManager is in an invalid state.
_InvalidSecretsManagerResourceException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An address book with attributes.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAddressBook</a> smart constructor.
data AddressBook
AddressBook' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AddressBook

-- | The ARN of the address book.
[$sel:addressBookArn:AddressBook'] :: AddressBook -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the address book.
[$sel:name:AddressBook'] :: AddressBook -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the address book.
[$sel:description:AddressBook'] :: AddressBook -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AddressBook</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:addressBookArn:AddressBook'</a>,
--   <a>addressBook_addressBookArn</a> - The ARN of the address book.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AddressBook'</a>, <a>addressBook_name</a> - The name of
--   the address book.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AddressBook'</a>, <a>addressBook_description</a> -
--   The description of the address book.

-- | The name of the address book.

-- | The description of the address book.

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAddressBookData</a> smart constructor.
data AddressBookData
AddressBookData' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AddressBookData

-- | The ARN of the address book.

-- | The name of the address book.
[$sel:name:AddressBookData'] :: AddressBookData -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the address book.
[$sel:description:AddressBookData'] :: AddressBookData -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AddressBookData</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:addressBookArn:AddressBookData'</a>,
--   <a>addressBookData_addressBookArn</a> - The ARN of the address book.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AddressBookData'</a>, <a>addressBookData_name</a> - The
--   name of the address book.

-- | The description of the address book.
addressBookData_description :: Lens' AddressBookData (Maybe Text)

-- | The audio message. There is a 1 MB limit on the audio file input and
--   the only supported format is MP3. To convert your MP3 audio files to
--   an Alexa-friendly,
--   
--   required codec version (MPEG version 2) and bit rate (48 kbps), you
--   might use converter software. One option for this is a command-line
--   tool, FFmpeg. For more information, see <a>FFmpeg</a>. The following
--   command converts the provided &lt;input-file&gt; to an MP3 file that
--   is played in the announcement:
--   
--   <pre>
--   ffmpeg -i &lt;input-file&gt; -ac 2 -codec:a libmp3lame -b:a 48k -ar 16000 &lt;output-file.mp3&gt;
--   </pre>
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAudio</a> smart constructor.
data Audio
Audio' :: Locale -> Text -> Audio

-- | The locale of the audio message. Currently, en-US is supported.
[$sel:locale:Audio'] :: Audio -> Locale

-- | The location of the audio file. Currently, S3 URLs are supported. Only
--   S3 locations comprised of safe characters are valid. For more
--   information, see <a>Safe Characters</a>.
[$sel:location:Audio'] :: Audio -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Audio</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:locale:Audio'</a>, <a>audio_locale</a> - The locale of the
--   audio message. Currently, en-US is supported.
--   
--   <a>$sel:location:Audio'</a>, <a>audio_location</a> - The location of
--   the audio file. Currently, S3 URLs are supported. Only S3 locations
--   comprised of safe characters are valid. For more information, see
--   <a>Safe Characters</a>.
newAudio :: Locale -> Text -> Audio

-- | The locale of the audio message. Currently, en-US is supported.
audio_locale :: Lens' Audio Locale

-- | The location of the audio file. Currently, S3 URLs are supported. Only
--   S3 locations comprised of safe characters are valid. For more
--   information, see <a>Safe Characters</a>.
audio_location :: Lens' Audio Text

-- | Usage report with specified parameters.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newBusinessReport</a> smart constructor.
data BusinessReport
BusinessReport' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe BusinessReportStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe BusinessReportFailureCode -> Maybe BusinessReportS3Location -> BusinessReport

-- | The download link where a user can download the report.
[$sel:downloadUrl:BusinessReport'] :: BusinessReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The status of the report generation execution (RUNNING, SUCCEEDED, or
--   FAILED).
[$sel:status:BusinessReport'] :: BusinessReport -> Maybe BusinessReportStatus

-- | The time of report delivery.
[$sel:deliveryTime:BusinessReport'] :: BusinessReport -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The failure code.
[$sel:failureCode:BusinessReport'] :: BusinessReport -> Maybe BusinessReportFailureCode

-- | The S3 location of the output reports.
[$sel:s3Location:BusinessReport'] :: BusinessReport -> Maybe BusinessReportS3Location

--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:downloadUrl:BusinessReport'</a>,
--   <a>businessReport_downloadUrl</a> - The download link where a user can
--   download the report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:BusinessReport'</a>, <a>businessReport_status</a> - The
--   status of the report generation execution (RUNNING, SUCCEEDED, or
--   FAILED).
--   
--   <a>$sel:deliveryTime:BusinessReport'</a>,
--   <a>businessReport_deliveryTime</a> - The time of report delivery.
--   
--   <a>$sel:failureCode:BusinessReport'</a>,
--   <a>businessReport_failureCode</a> - The failure code.
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3Location:BusinessReport'</a>,
--   <a>businessReport_s3Location</a> - The S3 location of the output
--   reports.
newBusinessReport :: BusinessReport

--   FAILED).

-- | An entity that provides a conferencing solution. Alexa for Business
--   acts as the voice interface and mediator that connects users to their
--   preferred conference provider. Examples of conference providers
--   include Amazon Chime, Zoom, Cisco, and Polycom.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newConferenceProvider</a> smart constructor.
data ConferenceProvider
ConferenceProvider' :: Maybe MeetingSetting -> Maybe IPDialIn -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe PSTNDialIn -> Maybe ConferenceProviderType -> ConferenceProvider

[$sel:iPDialIn:ConferenceProvider'] :: ConferenceProvider -> Maybe IPDialIn

[$sel:arn:ConferenceProvider'] :: ConferenceProvider -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the conference provider.
[$sel:name:ConferenceProvider'] :: ConferenceProvider -> Maybe Text

-- | The information for PSTN conferencing.
[$sel:pSTNDialIn:ConferenceProvider'] :: ConferenceProvider -> Maybe PSTNDialIn

-- | The type of conference providers.
[$sel:type':ConferenceProvider'] :: ConferenceProvider -> Maybe ConferenceProviderType

-- | Create a value of <a>ConferenceProvider</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   the conference provider.

--   calling.

--   The ARN of the newly created conference provider.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ConferenceProvider'</a>, <a>conferenceProvider_name</a> -
--   The name of the conference provider.
--

-- | A contact with attributes.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContact</a> smart constructor.
data Contact
Contact' :: Maybe (Sensitive Text) -> Maybe [PhoneNumber] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [SipAddress] -> Contact

-- | The phone number of the contact. The phone number type defaults to
--   WORK. You can either specify PhoneNumber or PhoneNumbers. We recommend
--   that you use PhoneNumbers, which lets you specify the phone number
--   type and multiple numbers.
[$sel:phoneNumber:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe (Sensitive Text)

-- | The list of phone numbers for the contact.
[$sel:phoneNumbers:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe [PhoneNumber]

-- | The last name of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
[$sel:lastName:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe Text

-- | The first name of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
[$sel:firstName:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the contact.
[$sel:contactArn:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the contact to display on the console.
[$sel:displayName:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of SIP addresses for the contact.
[$sel:sipAddresses:Contact'] :: Contact -> Maybe [SipAddress]

-- | Create a value of <a>Contact</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:phoneNumber:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_phoneNumber</a> - The
--   phone number of the contact. The phone number type defaults to WORK.
--   You can either specify PhoneNumber or PhoneNumbers. We recommend that
--   you use PhoneNumbers, which lets you specify the phone number type and
--   multiple numbers.
--   
--   <a>$sel:phoneNumbers:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_phoneNumbers</a> - The
--   list of phone numbers for the contact.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastName:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_lastName</a> - The last name
--   of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
--   
--   <a>$sel:firstName:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_firstName</a> - The first
--   name of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
--   
--   <a>$sel:contactArn:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_contactArn</a> - The ARN
--   of the contact.
--   
--   <a>$sel:displayName:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_displayName</a> - The
--   name of the contact to display on the console.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sipAddresses:Contact'</a>, <a>contact_sipAddresses</a> - The
--   list of SIP addresses for the contact.
newContact :: Contact

-- | The phone number of the contact. The phone number type defaults to
--   WORK. You can either specify PhoneNumber or PhoneNumbers. We recommend
--   that you use PhoneNumbers, which lets you specify the phone number
--   type and multiple numbers.

-- | The list of phone numbers for the contact.
contact_phoneNumbers :: Lens' Contact (Maybe [PhoneNumber])

-- | The last name of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
contact_lastName :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)

-- | The first name of the contact, used to call the contact on the device.
contact_firstName :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the contact.
contact_contactArn :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the contact to display on the console.
contact_displayName :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of SIP addresses for the contact.
contact_sipAddresses :: Lens' Contact (Maybe [SipAddress])

-- | The content definition. This can contain only one text, SSML, or audio
--   list object.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newContent</a> smart constructor.
data Content

[$sel:textList:Content'] :: Content -> Maybe [TextMessage]

-- | The list of SSML messages.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   text messages.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ssmlList:Content'</a>, <a>content_ssmlList</a> - The list of
--   SSML messages.
--   
--   <a>$sel:audioList:Content'</a>, <a>content_audioList</a> - The list of
--   audio messages.
newContent :: Content

-- | The list of text messages.
content_textList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [TextMessage])

-- | The list of SSML messages.
content_ssmlList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [Ssml])

-- | The list of audio messages.
content_audioList :: Lens' Content (Maybe [Audio])

-- | Creates settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are
--   applied to a room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa
--   to remind users when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateEndOfMeetingReminder</a> smart constructor.
data CreateEndOfMeetingReminder
CreateEndOfMeetingReminder' :: NonEmpty Int -> EndOfMeetingReminderType -> Bool -> CreateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | A range of 3 to 15 minutes that determines when the reminder begins.
[$sel:reminderAtMinutes:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: CreateEndOfMeetingReminder -> NonEmpty Int

-- | The type of sound that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
[$sel:reminderType:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: CreateEndOfMeetingReminder -> EndOfMeetingReminderType

-- | Whether an end of meeting reminder is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'] :: CreateEndOfMeetingReminder -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateEndOfMeetingReminder</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:reminderAtMinutes:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>createEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderAtMinutes</a> - A range of 3 to
--   15 minutes that determines when the reminder begins.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reminderType:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>createEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderType</a> - The type of sound
--   that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:CreateEndOfMeetingReminder'</a>,
--   <a>createEndOfMeetingReminder_enabled</a> - Whether an end of meeting
--   reminder is enabled or not.
newCreateEndOfMeetingReminder :: NonEmpty Int -> EndOfMeetingReminderType -> Bool -> CreateEndOfMeetingReminder

-- | A range of 3 to 15 minutes that determines when the reminder begins.
createEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderAtMinutes :: Lens' CreateEndOfMeetingReminder (NonEmpty Int)

-- | The type of sound that users hear during the end of meeting reminder.
createEndOfMeetingReminder_reminderType :: Lens' CreateEndOfMeetingReminder EndOfMeetingReminderType

-- | Whether an end of meeting reminder is enabled or not.
createEndOfMeetingReminder_enabled :: Lens' CreateEndOfMeetingReminder Bool

-- | Creates settings for the instant booking feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. When users start their meeting with Alexa, Alexa
--   automatically books the room for the configured duration if the room
--   is available.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateInstantBooking</a> smart constructor.
data CreateInstantBooking
CreateInstantBooking' :: Int -> Bool -> CreateInstantBooking

-- | Duration between 15 and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that
--   determines how long to book an available room when a meeting is
--   started with Alexa.
[$sel:durationInMinutes:CreateInstantBooking'] :: CreateInstantBooking -> Int

-- | Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:CreateInstantBooking'] :: CreateInstantBooking -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateInstantBooking</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--

--   it's free when joining a meeting with Alexa.

--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEndOfMeetingReminder</a> smart constructor.

-- | A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific
--   list of results. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by
--   various criteria.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: Text -> [Text] -> Filter

-- | The key of a filter.
[$sel:key:Filter'] :: Filter -> Text

-- | The values of a filter.
[$sel:values:Filter'] :: Filter -> [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_key</a> - The key of a filter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:values:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_values</a> - The values of a
--   filter.
newFilter :: Text -> Filter

-- | The key of a filter.
filter_key :: Lens' Filter Text

-- | The values of a filter.
filter_values :: Lens' Filter [Text]

-- | The details of the gateway.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGateway</a> smart constructor.
data Gateway
Gateway' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Gateway

-- | The ARN of the gateway.
[$sel:arn:Gateway'] :: Gateway -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the gateway group that the gateway is associated to.
[$sel:gatewayGroupArn:Gateway'] :: Gateway -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the gateway.
[$sel:name:Gateway'] :: Gateway -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the gateway.
[$sel:description:Gateway'] :: Gateway -> Maybe Text

-- | The software version of the gateway. The gateway automatically updates
--   its software version during normal operation.
[$sel:softwareVersion:Gateway'] :: Gateway -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Gateway</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Gateway'</a>, <a>gateway_arn</a> - The ARN of the gateway.
--   
--   <a>$sel:gatewayGroupArn:Gateway'</a>, <a>gateway_gatewayGroupArn</a> -
--   The ARN of the gateway group that the gateway is associated to.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Gateway'</a>, <a>gateway_name</a> - The name of the
--   gateway.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Gateway'</a>, <a>gateway_description</a> - The
--   description of the gateway.
--   
--   <a>$sel:softwareVersion:Gateway'</a>, <a>gateway_softwareVersion</a> -
--   The software version of the gateway. The gateway automatically updates
--   its software version during normal operation.
newGateway :: Gateway

-- | The ARN of the gateway.
gateway_arn :: Lens' Gateway (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the gateway group that the gateway is associated to.
gateway_gatewayGroupArn :: Lens' Gateway (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the gateway.
gateway_name :: Lens' Gateway (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the gateway.
gateway_description :: Lens' Gateway (Maybe Text)

-- | The software version of the gateway. The gateway automatically updates
--   its software version during normal operation.
gateway_softwareVersion :: Lens' Gateway (Maybe Text)

-- | The IP endpoint and protocol for calling.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newIPDialIn</a> smart constructor.
data IPDialIn
IPDialIn' :: Text -> CommsProtocol -> IPDialIn

-- | The IP address.
[$sel:endpoint:IPDialIn'] :: IPDialIn -> Text

-- | The protocol, including SIP, SIPS, and H323.
[$sel:commsProtocol:IPDialIn'] :: IPDialIn -> CommsProtocol

-- | Create a value of <a>IPDialIn</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:endpoint:IPDialIn'</a>, <a>iPDialIn_endpoint</a> - The IP
--   address.
--   
--   <a>$sel:commsProtocol:IPDialIn'</a>, <a>iPDialIn_commsProtocol</a> -
--   The protocol, including SIP, SIPS, and H323.
newIPDialIn :: Text -> CommsProtocol -> IPDialIn

-- | The IP address.
iPDialIn_endpoint :: Lens' IPDialIn Text

-- | The protocol, including SIP, SIPS, and H323.
iPDialIn_commsProtocol :: Lens' IPDialIn CommsProtocol

-- | Settings for the instant booking feature that are applied to a room
--   profile. When users start their meeting with Alexa, Alexa
--   automatically books the room for the configured duration if the room
--   is available.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newInstantBooking</a> smart constructor.
data InstantBooking
InstantBooking' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Bool -> InstantBooking

-- | Duration between 15 and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that
--   determines how long to book an available room when a meeting is
--   started with Alexa.
[$sel:durationInMinutes:InstantBooking'] :: InstantBooking -> Maybe Int

-- | Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
[$sel:enabled:InstantBooking'] :: InstantBooking -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>InstantBooking</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationInMinutes:InstantBooking'</a>,
--   <a>instantBooking_durationInMinutes</a> - Duration between 15 and 240
--   minutes at increments of 15 that determines how long to book an
--   available room when a meeting is started with Alexa.
--   
--   <a>$sel:enabled:InstantBooking'</a>, <a>instantBooking_enabled</a> -
--   Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
newInstantBooking :: InstantBooking

-- | Duration between 15 and 240 minutes at increments of 15 that
--   determines how long to book an available room when a meeting is
--   started with Alexa.
instantBooking_durationInMinutes :: Lens' InstantBooking (Maybe Int)

-- | Whether instant booking is enabled or not.
instantBooking_enabled :: Lens' InstantBooking (Maybe Bool)

-- | Meeting room settings of a room profile.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMeetingRoomConfiguration</a> smart constructor.
data MeetingRoomConfiguration
MeetingRoomConfiguration' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe EndOfMeetingReminder -> Maybe InstantBooking -> Maybe RequireCheckIn -> MeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
[$sel:roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled:MeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: MeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe Bool

-- | Settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
[$sel:endOfMeetingReminder:MeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: MeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe EndOfMeetingReminder

-- | Settings to automatically book the room if available for a configured
--   duration when joining a meeting with Alexa.
[$sel:instantBooking:MeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: MeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe InstantBooking

-- | Settings for requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can
--   cancel a room reservation if it's not checked into. This makes the
--   room available for others. Users can check in by joining the meeting
--   with Alexa or an AVS device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
[$sel:requireCheckIn:MeetingRoomConfiguration'] :: MeetingRoomConfiguration -> Maybe RequireCheckIn

-- | Create a value of <a>MeetingRoomConfiguration</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled:MeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>meetingRoomConfiguration_roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled</a> -
--   Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endOfMeetingReminder:MeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>meetingRoomConfiguration_endOfMeetingReminder</a> - Settings for
--   the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a room
--   profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind users
--   when a meeting is ending.
--   
--   <a>$sel:instantBooking:MeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>meetingRoomConfiguration_instantBooking</a> - Settings to
--   automatically book the room if available for a configured duration
--   when joining a meeting with Alexa.
--   
--   <a>$sel:requireCheckIn:MeetingRoomConfiguration'</a>,
--   <a>meetingRoomConfiguration_requireCheckIn</a> - Settings for
--   requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can cancel a room
--   reservation if it's not checked into. This makes the room available
--   for others. Users can check in by joining the meeting with Alexa or an
--   AVS device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
newMeetingRoomConfiguration :: MeetingRoomConfiguration

-- | Whether room utilization metrics are enabled or not.
meetingRoomConfiguration_roomUtilizationMetricsEnabled :: Lens' MeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe Bool)

-- | Settings for the end of meeting reminder feature that are applied to a
--   room profile. The end of meeting reminder enables Alexa to remind
--   users when a meeting is ending.
meetingRoomConfiguration_endOfMeetingReminder :: Lens' MeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe EndOfMeetingReminder)

-- | Settings to automatically book the room if available for a configured
--   duration when joining a meeting with Alexa.
meetingRoomConfiguration_instantBooking :: Lens' MeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe InstantBooking)

-- | Settings for requiring a check in when a room is reserved. Alexa can
--   cancel a room reservation if it's not checked into. This makes the
--   room available for others. Users can check in by joining the meeting
--   with Alexa or an AVS device, or by saying â€œAlexa, check in.â€
meetingRoomConfiguration_requireCheckIn :: Lens' MeetingRoomConfiguration (Maybe RequireCheckIn)

-- | The values that indicate whether a pin is always required (YES), never
--   required (NO), or OPTIONAL.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>If YES, Alexa will always ask for a meeting pin.</li>
--   <li>If NO, Alexa will never ask for a meeting pin.</li>
--   <li>If OPTIONAL, Alexa will ask if you have a meeting pin and if the
--   customer responds with yes, it will ask for the meeting pin.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMeetingSetting</a> smart constructor.
data MeetingSetting
MeetingSetting' :: RequirePin -> MeetingSetting

-- | The values that indicate whether the pin is always required.
[$sel:requirePin:MeetingSetting'] :: MeetingSetting -> RequirePin

-- | Create a value of <a>MeetingSetting</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:requirePin:MeetingSetting'</a>,
--   <a>meetingSetting_requirePin</a> - The values that indicate whether
--   the pin is always required.
newMeetingSetting :: RequirePin -> MeetingSetting

-- | The values that indicate whether the pin is always required.
meetingSetting_requirePin :: Lens' MeetingSetting RequirePin

-- | The network profile associated with a device.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNetworkProfile</a> smart constructor.
data NetworkProfile
NetworkProfile' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (NonEmpty Text) -> Maybe (Sensitive Text) -> Maybe NetworkEapMethod -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe NetworkSecurityType -> Maybe (Sensitive Text) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> NetworkProfile

-- | The ARN of the Private Certificate Authority (PCA) created in AWS
--   Certificate Manager (ACM). This is used to issue certificates to the
--   devices.
[$sel:certificateAuthorityArn:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe Text

-- | The root certificates of your authentication server, which is
--   installed on your devices and used to trust your authentication server
--   during EAP negotiation.
[$sel:trustAnchors:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe (NonEmpty Text)

-- | The current password of the Wi-Fi network.
[$sel:currentPassword:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe (Sensitive Text)

-- | The authentication standard that is used in the EAP framework.
--   Currently, EAP_TLS is supported.
[$sel:eapMethod:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe NetworkEapMethod

-- | The name of the network profile associated with a device.
[$sel:networkProfileName:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe Text

-- | Detailed information about a device's network profile.
[$sel:description:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe Text

-- | The security type of the Wi-Fi network. This can be WPA2_ENTERPRISE,
--   WPA2_PSK, WPA_PSK, WEP, or OPEN.
[$sel:securityType:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe NetworkSecurityType

-- | The next, or subsequent, password of the Wi-Fi network. This password
--   is asynchronously transmitted to the device and is used when the
--   password of the network changes to NextPassword.
[$sel:nextPassword:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe (Sensitive Text)

-- | The ARN of the network profile associated with a device.
[$sel:networkProfileArn:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe Text

-- | The SSID of the Wi-Fi network.
[$sel:ssid:NetworkProfile'] :: NetworkProfile -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>NetworkProfile</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:certificateAuthorityArn:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_certificateAuthorityArn</a> - The ARN of the Private
--   Certificate Authority (PCA) created in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM).
--   This is used to issue certificates to the devices.
--   
--   <a>$sel:trustAnchors:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_trustAnchors</a> - The root certificates of your
--   authentication server, which is installed on your devices and used to
--   trust your authentication server during EAP negotiation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:currentPassword:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_currentPassword</a> - The current password of the
--   Wi-Fi network.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eapMethod:NetworkProfile'</a>, <a>networkProfile_eapMethod</a>
--   - The authentication standard that is used in the EAP framework.
--   Currently, EAP_TLS is supported.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkProfileName:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_networkProfileName</a> - The name of the network
--   profile associated with a device.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_description</a> - Detailed information about a
--   device's network profile.
--   
--   <a>$sel:securityType:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_securityType</a> - The security type of the Wi-Fi
--   network. This can be WPA2_ENTERPRISE, WPA2_PSK, WPA_PSK, WEP, or OPEN.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextPassword:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_nextPassword</a> - The next, or subsequent, password
--   of the Wi-Fi network. This password is asynchronously transmitted to
--   the device and is used when the password of the network changes to
--   NextPassword.
--   
--   <a>$sel:networkProfileArn:NetworkProfile'</a>,
--   <a>networkProfile_networkProfileArn</a> - The ARN of the network
--   profile associated with a device.
--   
--   <a>$sel:ssid:NetworkProfile'</a>, <a>networkProfile_ssid</a> - The
--   SSID of the Wi-Fi network.
newNetworkProfile :: NetworkProfile

-- | The ARN of the Private Certificate Authority (PCA) created in AWS
--   Certificate Manager (ACM). This is used to issue certificates to the
--   devices.
networkProfile_certificateAuthorityArn :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The root certificates of your authentication server, which is
--   installed on your devices and used to trust your authentication server
--   during EAP negotiation.
networkProfile_trustAnchors :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe (NonEmpty Text))

-- | The current password of the Wi-Fi network.
networkProfile_currentPassword :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The authentication standard that is used in the EAP framework.
--   Currently, EAP_TLS is supported.
networkProfile_eapMethod :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe NetworkEapMethod)

-- | The name of the network profile associated with a device.
networkProfile_networkProfileName :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | Detailed information about a device's network profile.
networkProfile_description :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The security type of the Wi-Fi network. This can be WPA2_ENTERPRISE,
--   WPA2_PSK, WPA_PSK, WEP, or OPEN.
networkProfile_securityType :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe NetworkSecurityType)

-- | The next, or subsequent, password of the Wi-Fi network. This password
--   is asynchronously transmitted to the device and is used when the
--   password of the network changes to NextPassword.
networkProfile_nextPassword :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the network profile associated with a device.
networkProfile_networkProfileArn :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The SSID of the Wi-Fi network.
networkProfile_ssid :: Lens' NetworkProfile (Maybe Text)

-- | The data associated with a network profile.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNetworkProfileData</a> smart constructor.
data NetworkProfileData

--   devices.

--   devices.
